about_the_game:
Establish Your Stronghold

 Start with an empty plot of land, and gradually expand your base by deploying into raids and gathering essential resources. As you venture out, you'll scavenge items from abandoned towns, ruins, and other hazardous locations, carefully extracting valuable materials like guns, ammo, and food. Every raid brings its own set of dangers, from radioactive zones to swarming mutant creatures. Some regions are heavily contaminated, requiring special gear and caution to loot safely. These zones might hide rare resources, but also host terrifying, radiation-mutated monsters that could easily overwhelm an unprepared survivor.

Build and Fortify Your Base 

Back at your base, use the resources you gather to construct new structures, fortify walls, and develop areas that support your growing community. The more you build, the more survivors you'll attract. These survivors come with unique skills and specialties—some may be engineers, able to repair or improve your armory; others might be skilled medics, offering healing services. As you expand, you’ll also attract traders who bring exotic goods from far-off places, but their supplies come at a steep price. Negotiating with them and exchanging loot for crucial supplies could turn the tide in your survival.

Survive in a Dangerous World 

Along with the growing base, you’ll face ever-present threats. The world around you is constantly shifting, and you must adapt. Dangerous mutants—twisted by the apocalypse’s radioactive fallout—roam the wilderness, and become more common as time continues and some may even infiltrate your base. Your best defense might be well-equipped guards, fortified outposts, and traps designed to ward off these horrific invaders. The wasteland is unpredictable, and with the constant looming threat of radiation storms and mutant hordes, staying one step ahead is vital.

Make Strategic Decisions 

Your decisions will be key to surviving. As you deploy into new areas for exploration, gathering crucial resources and completing quests, you may stumble upon new factions, rogue survivors, or hostile creatures. Completing missions for these groups might offer unique rewards, such as new weapons, armor, or blueprints for advanced technology. But be careful—alliances are fragile, and sometimes helping one group means making enemies with another.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence and slight isometric gore, with slight drug and alcohol usage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 2GB dedicated ram
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: ApocaShift is a dynamic roguelite extraction looter set in a constantly evolving apocalyptic world. The environment shifts based on in-game events and decisions, offering fresh challenges and opportunities with each playthrough.
